albania.other_details: Other includes Vlach, Roma (Gypsy), Serb, Macedonian, Bulgarian

argentina.other_details: White population mostly of Spanish and Italian descent

armenia.other_details: Other includes mostly Yezidi Kurds. Note: as of 1993, virtually all Azeris had emigrated

bhutan.other_details: Ngalop (also known as Bhote) are people of Tibetan origin

bolivia.other_details: Indigenous includes Quechua and Aymara peoples

brazil.other_details: Large Japanese-Brazilian population included in Asian category

canada.other_details: Large Chinese and South Asian populations included in Asian category

egypt.other_details: Includes Bedouin Arab, Berber, and Nubian minorities

france.other_details: Note: France does not collect official statistics on ethnicity

india.other_details: Extremely diverse with numerous subgroups within major ethnic categories

israel.other_details: Jewish population includes various ethnic subgroups from different regions

libya.other_details: Other includes Greeks, Maltese, Italians, Egyptians, Pakistanis, Turks, Indians, and Tunisians
